roleset.name: pathological, diseased
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8.

example.name: arg1
example.text: At this point we have done the hemicraniectomy , and there is not likely a whole lot we could do short of taking out the clot and taking out the AVM which-1 [*-1] would be highly morbid at this time .

role.descr: aspect/subject matter about which arg1 is morbid

example.name: both args
example.text: He was morbid in his credulous rashness.
